Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Entity
      • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends Entity
    Class that represents the bombs used by the player to destroy blocks and kill enemies

      • update

        public void update(int delta,
          Level level)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Method that updates the timer of the bomb until it goes bellow zero. When the timer goes bellow zero the bomb is deactivated.
        Parameters:
        delta - Time to advance
        level - The level object containing all the other entities
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
